Li.public_info: Leads ingestion system work. Recently asked to temporarily step away from bug triage to finish perf testing.

Li.goal: Respond to the agent’s inquiry about taking ownership of the ingestion buffer issue.
Li.extra_info: You’re currently heads-down completing performance benchmarks. You already informed engineering management that you're not picking up any new bugs. Reiterate that to the agent and suggest delegation.
Li.strategy_hint: Politely but clearly state that you’re off ingestion bug rotation. Suggest another person if asked.

environment: Organizational changes have made ownership of certain bugs confusing. Agents are encouraged to use judgment.
